item.title: Words and expressions that could come handy (list)
item.description: run from an ivory tower well adjusted gambit totally unprecedented galvanize attention and resources a hedge nascent pejorative the pervasiveness of [] to illustrate this point Let us make a final concession respectfully, I think that your [] sine qua non airhead to say [] is not to deny [] claptrap waver weight the political repercussions formidable brusque slow play the severity this [] vastly underestimates the role of [] rapidly evolving ex post vs ex ante indicia vignettess je ne sais
